name: PublicMarketGuide
tagline: Public Market Guide - App Submission for AT&T Rochester Civic App Challenge
body:
# Public Market Guide
This application provides information about markets, vendors, events, and eateries for farmer's markets in the Monroe County, NY area.  The application is supported on both the iOS and Android platforms.  Native device features such as maps, email, and the phone dialer are easily accessed through entries for vendors, markets, etc.

### About The Application
This application was developed by Nick Evevsky and Peter Traeg (@ptraeg) for the [AT&T Rochester Civic App Challenge](http://attroc.hackupstate.com/).  This [Vimeo Video](http://vimeo.com/92677689) provides some background on why the application was created and the technologies used to build the app.

![ATT Rochester Civic App Challenge](http://attroc.hackupstate.com/assets/img/new_app_challenge_logo.jpg)

### Android Application File
An Android APK of the application can also be [downloaded](apks/PublicMarketGuideV1.apk)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
